experience.title: Founding Partner
experience.description: Democratising access to the highest returning asset classes with a preference for female investors in order to accelerate wealth generation for women.We layer a secondary trading platform which furthers the goal of accelerated wealth generation.Our hypothesis is that this is the most effective way to reverse the dire statistics of only 1% percent of venture capital going to women. With more wealth in the hands of women and more investment experience, this should mean more female decision-makers holding access to capital.Romanna first founded Women Collective in Sloane Square London as a coworking facility in 2016 (the first of its kind) with wellness centres and boutique space. #Inclusiveinvestments

experience.title: Board Member
experience.description: Making learning fun, addictive, immersive and effective. Creating VR/AR experiences of the world's museums/cities & beyond in a #metaverse where children can travel with their friends. Traditional education models  are killing our children's creativity with a curriculum was designed for a world which no longer exists.Wonder was born out of the original Childsplay brand which Romanna founded in 2019 as play/ dining areas for children with an embedded SPA (4 sites across London pre Covid)
